user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for comfortable, supportive bras that are also affordable and suitable for everyday wear.
purchase_reason: I was looking for a comfortable yet stylish option for everyday wear that wouldn't break the bank. The combination of full coverage and a racerback design appealed to my need for support and ease of wear. The positive review about the price and fit, despite a slight size issue, reassured me that I was making a good choice for my budget.

I wanted a bra that offered comfort and a smooth look under clothing. The features of being wirefree and made from lightweight fabric were particularly appealing. The fact that my daughters found them comfortable and that the price was better than local stores influenced my decision positively.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer high quality, comfort, and durability. I appreciate items that are well-constructed and provide a good fit, as seen in my positive experiences with socks, shoes, and clothing that emphasize comfort and functionality. I also value products that are easy to care for and maintain their quality over time. On the other hand, I tend to dislike items that feel poorly made or lack durability, as well as those that do not meet my expectations in terms of quality and comfort. Overall, I gravitate towards products that combine practicality with a pleasing aesthetic, ensuring they serve their purpose effectively while also being enjoyable to use.

conversation.content: I want comfortable, supportive bras that are affordable and suitable for everyday wear. within my expected price range: [18.99, 21.99]
What specific features or qualities do you prioritize in terms of comfort and support when looking for everyday wear bras?

I generally prioritize bras that offer good support without feeling constricting. Comfort is key for me, so I look for soft materials and designs that won't dig into my skin. I also prefer wire-free options for a more relaxed fit throughout the day. Durability is important too, as I want bras that will maintain their shape and support over time. A smooth look under clothing is also a priority for me.
What sizes do you typically wear in bras to ensure the perfect fit for your everyday wear?

I typically wear sizes that provide a good balance between comfort and support. I aim for sizes that fit snugly without feeling too tight or too loose, ensuring that the bra offers the right level of support throughout the day. A size that accommodates my body shape well is crucial for me to feel comfortable and confident in my everyday wear.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Bali Double Support Wireless Bra, Full-Coverage Wirefree T-Shirt Bra, Comfortable Cotton Wirefree Bra, Our Best Everyday Bra> / Item ID: B000MX5ZSM / Price: $18.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Cotton comfort. This women's Bali double support bra is a must-have"] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Bali Lace Desire Wireless Bra, Full-Coverage Wirefree Bra, ComfortFlex Fit Convertible Bra for Everyday Wear> / Item ID: B071KQC71Y / Price: $18.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["If you're looking for a lacy, wireless, full-coverage bra that offers sublimely comfortable support, look no further. The Lace Desire® bra is designed with Bali's ComfortFlex® Fit system for a perfect fit from sizes S-2XL. Wirefree cups provide full coverage and are lightly lined to shape and support. Gorgeous open lace covers the entire style and even extends above and below the cups. The no-slip straps are easily adjustable and also designed to convert to a crisscross back with the simple J-hook that's included for wearing flexibility. This bra really does offer the best of everything."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's SmoothTec ComfortFlex Fit Wirefree Bra MHG199> / Item ID: B01HRFT6YQ / Price: $12.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Welcome to a wireless world where you never have to sacrifice comfort for support. Hanes® Smooth Comfort® wireless bra is brilliantly constructed for both. Carefully shaped foam cups and Hanes®' stay-in-place SmoothTec® band provide all the support you need, with the brand's ComfortFlex Fit® fabric that molds to your shape, not the other way around. One of the best features of this wirefree convertible bra is the Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks away moisture to keep you cool and dry all day. This seamless, wireless bra provides full coverage with a flattering sweetheart neckline. You'll also appreciate the smooth cups and seamless construction that make this an ideal T-shirt bra. One more handy design detail is the convertible straps that offer two ways to wear for fashion flexibility."]
